info.title: Invoice API
info.description: A statement of the money due for goods or services; a bill.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Keyword search for item

parameters.name: accountid
parameters.description: The identifier for the account the payment will be applied to.

parameters.name: additionaltype
parameters.description: An additional type for the item, typically used for adding more specific types from external vocabularies in microdata syntax. This is a relationship between something and a class that the thing is in. In RDFa syntax, it is better to use the native RDFa syntax - the \'typeof\' attribute - for multiple types. Schema.org tools may have only weaker understanding of extra types, in particular those defined externally.

parameters.name: alternatename
parameters.description: An alias for the item.

parameters.name: billingperiod
parameters.description: The time interval used to compute the invoice.

parameters.name: broker
parameters.description: An entity that arranges for an exchange between a buyer and a seller.  In most cases a broker never acquires or releases ownership of a product or service involved in an exchange.  If it is not clear whether an entity is a broker, seller, or buyer, the latter two terms are preferred. Supersedes bookingAgent.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: A category for the item. Greater signs or slashes can be used to informally indicate a category hierarchy.

parameters.name: confirmationnumber
parameters.description: A number that confirms the given order or payment has been received.

parameters.name: customer
parameters.description: Party placing the order or paying the invoice.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: A short description of the item.

parameters.name: image
parameters.description: An image of the item. This can be a URL or a fully described ImageObject.

parameters.name: mainentityofpage
parameters.description: Indicates a page (or other CreativeWork) for which this thing is the main entity being described.            See background notes for details.       Inverse property: mainEntity.

parameters.name: minimumpaymentdue
parameters.description: The minimum payment required at this time.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the item.

parameters.name: partofinvoice
parameters.description: The order is being paid as part of the referenced Invoice.

parameters.name: paymentduedate
parameters.description: The date that payment is due. Supersedes paymentDue.

parameters.name: paymentmethod
parameters.description: The name of the credit card or other method of payment for the order.

parameters.name: paymentmethodid
parameters.description: An identifier for the method of payment used (e.g. the last 4 digits of the credit card).

parameters.name: paymentstatus
parameters.description: The status of payment; whether the invoice has been paid or not.

parameters.name: potentialaction
parameters.description: Indicates a potential Action, which describes an idealized action in which this thing would play an \'object\' role.

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description: The service provider, service operator, or service performer; the goods producer. Another party (a seller) may offer those services or goods on behalf of the provider. A provider may also serve as the seller. Supersedes carrier.

parameters.name: referencesorder
parameters.description: The Order(s) related to this Invoice. One or more Orders may be combined into a single Invoice.

parameters.name: sameas
parameters.description: URL of a reference Web page that unambiguously indicates the item\'s identity. E.g. the URL of the item\'s Wikipedia page, Freebase page, or official website.

parameters.name: scheduledpaymentdate
parameters.description: The date the invoice is scheduled to be paid.

parameters.name: totalpaymentdue
parameters.description: The total amount due.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: URL of the item.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique id for item

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique id for item

parameters.name: accountid
parameters.description: The identifier for the account the payment will be applied to.
